name: Flipper
tagline: Flipper effect for interactive image caption
body:
### The Flipper Effect.
This an effect for your web pages, to include a caption to your images. The caption is shown on mouseover, when image perform a flip animation.

### Demo:
This is a Demo Page

### Source:
The source can be found on github:
[Flipper Sources](https://www.github.com/jgirbau/Flipper)

### Support or Contact
You can contact the author at: [Jorge Girbau](https://www.github.com/jgirbau)

Or you can submit suggestion or special request to:
[jorge.girbau@gmail.com](jorge.girbau@gmail.com)
